data.title: MVD Entertainment Group Customer B2B
data.meta_description:
It's been 70 years since 1949 - the year in which the big band sound diminished, and singers flourished. Songs released that year became all-time classics. This compilation presents 25 of the biggest hits of 1949, including Riders In The Sky, Mule Train, & The Huckle-Buck.
Legendary stars on this album include Doris Day, Mel Torme, Bing Crosby, Frankie Laine, Jo Stafford, & Kay Starr.
data.text:
Russ Morgan v/The Skylarks - Cruisin Down The River

Jo Stafford & Gordon MacRae - My Darling, My Darling

Vaughan Monroe - Rider’s In The Sky (A Cowboy Legend)

Margaret Whiting - Far Away Places

Dinah Shore & Buddy Clark - Baby It’s Cold Outside

Frankie Laine - Mule Train

Gordon Jenkins v/Betty Brewer - Don’t Cry Joe (Let Her Go, Let Her Go, Let Her Go)

Dick Haymes - Maybe It’s Because

Evelyn Knight - A Little Bird Told Me

Ezio Pinza - Some Enchanted Evening

Les Brown - I’ve Got My Love To Keep Me Warm

Vic Damone - You’re Breaking My Heart

Dinah Shore - Lavender Blue (Dilly Dilly)

Mel Torme - Careless Hands

Margaret Whiting & Jimmy Wakely - Slipping Around

Evelyn Knight with The Stardusters - Powder Your Face With Sunshine

Perry Como with The Fontane Sisters - ‘A’ You’re Adorable

Kay Starr - So Tired

Bing Crosby - Galway Bay

Doris Day - Again

Tommy Dorsey v/Charlie Shavers - The Huckle-Buck

Sammy Kaye v/don Cornell - Room Full Of Roses

The Mills Brothers - Someday

Al Morgan - Jealous Heart

Frankie Laine - That Lucky Old Sun
